snippet: The grave of Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, the seventh grand rebbe of the Lubavitcher group of Hasidic Jews, has evolved into a spiritual touchstone of the religious movement he spawned.
abstract: Burial site of Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, seventh grand rebbe of Lubavitcher group of Hasidic Jews, has evolved into a spiritual touchstone of religious movement he spawned; grave, in Old Montefiore Cemetery in Cambria Heights, Queens, draws vast swath of visitors each year.
lead_paragraph: The grave of Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, the seventh grand rebbe of the Lubavitcher group of Hasidic Jews, has evolved into a spiritual touchstone of the religious movement he spawned.

headline.main: Jews Make a Pilgrimage to a Grand Rebbe’s Grave
headline.print_headline: Jews Make a Pilgrimage To a Grand Rebbe’s Grave
